Deities @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Atreia], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Chohar], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Hathor], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Horus], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Jaidi], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Luhar], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Nurgal], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Ra], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Sarenrae], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Shizuru], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Sturovenen], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.The Path of the Heavens], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.The Prismatic Ray], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Tlehar], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Walkena]

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Dazzling Flash]; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Positive Luminance]

You harness the power of the sun and other light sources, and punish undead.
name: Sun Domain
